description: Periodic palindromic structures using exactly two different symbols.
comments: For example, aaabbb is not a (finite) palindrome but it is a periodic palindrome. Permuting the symbols will not change the structure.
references: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia.
author: Marks R. Nester (nesterm(AT)dpi.qld.gov.au)
